CustomField.description: BODEV-76: Indicates whether additional approval from VP CS is required. BODEV-683: Deprecated as One-off approval also goes to Sales Director.
CustomField.formula:
/* IF( ISPICKVAL( Ultimate_DoA_Level__c , "Sales Manager") && ISPICKVAL( DoA_Level_One_off_Discount__c , "VP of Customer Success"), TRUE, FALSE) */
FALSE
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Ultimate DoA Level is Sales Manager and DoA Level: One-off discount is VP of CS, then additional approval from VP of CS is required in addition to approval from Sales Manager.
CustomField.label: VP CS Approval Required?
